name: Friends or Lovers
overview: Friends or Lovers is a quiz game designed to be played by a couple. Questions vary but are mostly to do with one's values. Each player inputs their own opinion using the number keys and then enters what they think their partner's response will be. Couples are ultimately rated on their compatibility in communication, love & romance, values, sex, work & money, spirituality, and play. Final, each player discovers how many of their partner's answers they guessed correctly.
